prompts: Create a Pokemon with sleek black wings and a mysterious aura that thrives in dark caves.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon with vibrant colors that can fly through forests and mountains.
Imagine a bat-like creature with striking blue features, perfect for exploring urban landscapes.
Generate an eerie Pokemon with unique abilities, showcasing a blend of black and pink colors.
Design a small, agile Pokemon that uses speed and stealth in its combat style.
Give me a flying Pokemon with a menacing look, known for lurking in shadows.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of night, featuring dark colors and large wings.
